summary: "Three's Company" is an American TV comedy that ran from 1977 to 1984. It's about three single friends, Jack, Janet, and Chrissy, who live together in California. They have lots of funny misunderstandings and adventures while dealing with their social lives and money problems. Based on a British show, it was very popular and still is today. It even led to two spin-off series.
title: Three's Company
